content.value:
I wonder sometimes if the rampant burnout and anxiety we feel is because we don’t accept — nor truly believe — that thinking is work.

But it is. And thinking can happen anywhere. At the gym. In bed. On a walk. In a sauna. At lunch.

Ideas require quiet. Solutions too.
content.html: I wonder sometimes if the rampant burnout and anxiety we feel is because we don’t accept — nor truly believe — that thinking is work. But it is. And thinking can happen anywhere. At the gym. In bed. On a walk. In a sauna. At lunch. Ideas require quiet. Solutions too.
